thread.title: Xcel Energy 1st Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Xcel Energy 1st Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call
text:
MINNEAPOLIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- On Thursday, April 26, 2018, Xcel Energy (NASDAQ: XEL) will host a conference call to review first quarter 2018 financial results. Earnings will be released prior to the opening of trading.
The call will begin at 9:00 a.m. Central Time. To participate in the conference call, please dial in at least 5-10 minutes prior to the scheduled start and follow the operatorâ€™s instructions. You will be asked for the conference ID number.
US Dial-In: 800-967-7137
International Dial-In: 719-457-2735
Conference ID: 3737478
The conference call will also be simultaneously broadcast and archived on our website, along with an MP3 download, at the following location:
http://www.xcelenergy.com
Under Company, select: Investor Relations
If you are unable to participate in the live event, the call will be available for replay from 1:00 p.m. on April 26 through 11:00 p.m. on April 29, Central Time.
Replay Numbers
US Dial-In: 888-203-1112
International Dial-In: 719-457-0820
Replay Passcode: 3737478
Financial analysts may call:
Paul Johnson, Vice President - Investor Relations 612-215-4535
News media inquiries please call Xcel Energy Media Relations at 612-215-5300.
Internet: www.xcelenergy.com
About Xcel Energy
Xcel Energy (NASDAQ: XEL) provides the energy that powers millions of homes and businesses across eight Western and Midwestern states. Headquartered in Minneapolis, the company is an industry leader in responsibly reducing carbon emissions and producing and delivering clean energy solutions from a variety of renewable sources at competitive prices. For more information, visit xcelenergy.com or follow us on Twitter and Facebook .
